name: OpioidOverdoseHelp
0:
”Alexa, open opioid overdose help”
”Alexa, start opioid overdose help”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: opioid overdose help
des:
This skill will walk you through the steps of recognizing an opioid overdose and acting quickly to administer Narcan nasal spray and get help to potentially save a life. The information in this skill is provided for informational and educational purposes only. It is not a substitute for professional medical
advice, treatment, or diagnosis. Call your doctor to receive medical advice. If you think you may have a medical emergency, please dial your local emergency response phone number
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
